name: @soulofmischief/strings
description: A collection of useful methods which operate on strings

scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && cp -f package.json lib && npm publish --access public lib
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && cp -f package.json lib && npm publish --access public lib
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm version major && cp -f package.json lib && npm publish --access public lib

author: soulofmischief
